website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for quality, style, and beauty. Versatile with the ability to enhance almost any room in your home.
pros: Beautiful, soft, and plushy with a luxurious feel
Comes in several neutral colors and a wide range of shapes and sizes
cons: It's more costly per foot than others, but you get quality craftsmanship for the money

customer_reviews.title: Heavy beautiful rug with brown undertones
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this rug. Unlike the nuloom rug I was replacing this is heavy and thick and just feels like quality. Also, as a huge plus for me this has some brownish undertones to it. I bought a couch from Kasala which although deemed "gray" has some very distinct brown undertones. Gray tends to either go a little towards blue or a little towards brown. If you need something that definitely looks gray, but won't clash with browns, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: SandraP

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of wear
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this rug for exactly 6 months now. As you can see from the pictures, it does look a little worn. The pattern looks blurry and it’s not as fluffy. It’s not as soft- more clumpy looking/feeling if that makes sense.. I’m going to get it professionally cleaned and see if that makes a difference. Overall it’s not bad though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Soft, looks amazing, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this rug! I was so skeptical about buying a rug online, but this rug is the softest, most beautiful rug I’ve ever bought! And it’s a lower price point than local big box stores! Not to mention more astheltically pleasing than any I’ve seen locally. I’m not a paid product reviewer, just a mom of 3 who loves online shopping.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this rug!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been searching for a rug for myself for what seemed like months, when I ended up ordering my sister a rug for christmas from the Safavieh Dallas Shag Collection ($70 or so cheaper, also through Amazon). I really liked it, but thought it was a little thin for what I wanted (I think they call that the 'pile'...?), so I found this one (from the Safavieh Hudson Shag Collection) and its perfect! Much thinker and more luxurious than the other one. The color is also perfect. The "grey" isn't a solid color, so it blends in well with different shades.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN M. FAIRCLOTH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is a great addition to the living room! I am replacing my very expensive jute rug that unraveled in about 5 months. This seems much sturdier and is so plush and soft for the price. It's also a perfect shade of ivory to hide anything the dogs track in... not too bright white but still provides the brightness I was looking for. I was worried the gray would clash with the browns in the room, but it actually blends in well.
customer_reviews.author: NewfieLover

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this rug and I LOVE IT! I wanted to purchase the 6x9, but the 5'1" x 7' 6" was $100 less, so I couldn't justify spending that much more for a foot or so more of space.... but I'm happy with the size! Its soooo fluffy.... my cats love it already! quality looks really good... and the price was even more perfect! its already nice and flat after a day... there was a smell (like a new carpet smell) but it's already gone away. I would say you will not be disappointed with this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystie

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This rug is so comfortable. I want one for every room in my house. I can not say anything bad about it. It came packaged well I love the colors, will be buying this in other colors and sizes. Wish i could give it 10 stars cause it deserves it. You will not be disappointed BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Rug looks worn less than a year after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug almost a year ago. It looked gorgeous in our home when it first arrived, so I would have initially rated this as five stars. We have two children but we don’t keep shoes on in the house, so i was surprised at how quickly it started looking worn. The color has faded and the threading is coming loose. I took a picture that compares the part of the rug that has been under the couch vs the part that has been exposed this past year. It is difficult to clean and vacuum, so sadly I’m back looking for a new rug to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Don't mind the husband and dogs. This is the 6x9 rug. I wanted something really soft and a little bit thicker than some of the quality I have been seeing at Target or Home Depot. The reviews really don't lie, it's fluffy and looks like high quality. I don't regret this but for a second. It has a great farmhouse/rustic look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ayinde T

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 9x12 area rug for our great room. We have had this rug for over two years now. It has been through twin toddlers and a dog and it has held up! So comfortable! Most days I lay on the floor because I love how it feels! Can be difficult to vacuum over but we just had to adjust the vaccum setting to catch all the snacks and cereal my kids drop on it. Would highly recommend if you are looking for a chic yet comfortable option for An area rug.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Very plush and soft beautiful rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! It looks expensive. It is very thick and plush. It does NOT have an odor like I read in some other reviews. I am thinking of buying several more of these rugs. Mine is an 8x10 and is perfect on our hard word floors. Great accent to the room. I highly recommend this rug! And my Dyson has no problems vacuuming the rug. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy O

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be ever so slightly darker in person. The material isn’t soft by any means, but the pile is very thick so it’s teally nice to walk on. No more cold feet in the morning! Can’t beat the price. Comes tightly rolled, but three days of shuffling heavy boxes around flattened it out nicely and the fibers have quickly relaxed. I expected it to take much longer to lay flat. Very satisfied with this!
customer_reviews.author: LaurindaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Way better than I expected. The carpet is very dense. It feels heavy just lifting a corner. The strands extend well past the bottom. Has a nice feel when stepping on it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Greene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I got this rug for our living room, and it's exactly what we wanted. Very thick rug, feels amazing on bare feet. You can vacuum it as well and it not get caught up. Beautiful feature in our home. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BlakeB4

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: I got the grey/ivory runner. Love it! It’s super soft and fluffy and looks very good. It’s a warm grey. Already received complements for it. Husband and son love how it feels under their feet.
customer_reviews.author: annika

customer_reviews.title: You won't be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are so happy with this purchase. I was a bit hesitant to purchase a rug online, but I'm so glad I did. The price on amazon was unbeatable for this extra large area rug. We would of paid twice as much in the stores. We get compliments on this rug from all our quest, and they love how soft it is. Our small shark vacuum does a great job cleaning this rug. We loved it so much we bought a Safavieh runner for our entry way area. This is the ultimate shag rug at the right price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.Smith

customer_reviews.title: In love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often leave product reviews, but I felt compelled to write about this one. Y’all! This. Rug. Is. AMAZING. I replaced a $400 Wayfair rug with this one, and I feel like a fool for not searching Amazon first. This rug is super soft (as in my kids wanted to sleep on it instead of in their beds the first night we unrolled it 🤦🏼‍♀️) and plush, rolls out flat from the package (no curling up on the ends), and the color is exactly as described. I can’t comment on whether it is easy to clean, as we just unrolled it a few days ago, but so far, this is a 5-star purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this area rug. I purchased the grey 10x12. I think it was a little pricey but must say the quality is amazing. Very heavy and plush. I had a cheaper rug I could compared it to and it’s night in day when walking on it. This one I has a lot more cushion and is super comfortable walking on it barefoot. It was packaged very well for delivery. I’m considering purchasing another one. Love the color, style and feel.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Stop shopping around and just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several Safavieh products over the years and they are always well made with great quality materials that never disappoint and are meant to last. I purchased a large area rug with the same pattern (just opposite colors) a few years ago for our sitting room and it was a great investment. It has held up well and still as soft as the day we unrolled it, so I knew this runner would look great in my kitchen without needing to be replaced anytime soon. It's soft, plush, durable and really everything I could ask for. Even our 2 small dogs enjoy napping on it from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This rug was just what I was looking for. The color in the picture is pretty accurate, it's soft and fluffy and also easy to clean (doesn't get stuck in our dyson). We've received multiple compliments on it. It doesn't really need a rug pad underneath but it does slide around if you don't have anything beneath to hold it in place (we have hardwood laminate floors). We bought a rug pad anyway to keep it in place and it just adds to the comfort of it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuenyuen8

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy, holds color, looks nice, keeps dirt out 👍
customer_reviews.text: We tried several other entry rugs before landing on this one. We really like this carpet. It is very fluffy and as you can tell from the photos, our dog loves it! She spends a decent amount of the day napping on it. We use it in front of the door and it is just tall enough that the door can open over it. We keep it in place with some stickers and it has not moved since we purchased it. It keeps all of the moisture out of the house but looks nicer than a normal entry rug. Very pleased with the purchase. Worth the price! Will buy from this manufacture again.
customer_reviews.author: FaithFuelFitness

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug, very lush, but it SMELLS of chemicals. :(
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a way to air out this rug. My house has smelled like chemical fumes since I got it, and now I have a pounding headache. I've been running our air purifier. I hope the smell eventually goes away. I ordered 2 more of these very large rugs (only one has arrived so far) and I'm not looking forward to even MORE smell once the other two arrive and are unpacked. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase, so long as the rug's chemical smell eventually goes away. The rug is very lush and thick and could very easily cost me 3 to 4 times more than what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Noooo attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: It is soft, that much is true, but the attention to detail they advertise is false. The rug is cut unevenly on both ends. It’s also MUCH shorter than the advertised 12 ft length. Even my husband noticed and thought the rug was crooked. I’ve bought many, many Safavieh rugs in the past. The quality on this one is poor. I contacted customer service, they said they would get back to me and they never did. As it’s not possible to get it back in the shrink wrap, I’m stuck with a crooked rug runner in the main hallway.
customer_reviews.author: NC4me

customer_reviews.title: Best brand of rugs that I can find on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: At this point this is the only brand of rug I buy on Amazon. All of the rugs are absolutely plush high-quality and feel amazing to walk on! For the price point these are excellent. I have now purchased three of these to put in my Airbnb because I wanna high quality feeling rug and this fits the bill.All of their rugs are absolutely plush high-quality and feel amazing to walk on! For the price point these are excellent. I’ve now purchased three of these to put in my Airbnb because I want a high-quality feeling rug and this fits the bill. Just an excellent line of rugs!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: So soft and fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can’t answer for the longtime usage, but it is so soft and fluffy! I replaced a cheap IKEA shag rug and I can absolutely tell the difference between the qualities. I wanted a shag rug from Costco, but I wasn’t willing to shell out $400 for a rug with two little kiddos. I feel like this rug is an in between of the two (cheap IKEA RUG and expensive Costco rug). I’m relieved that the color was lighter than the picture and that depending on what surrounds it, it reflects different colors so it matches. Kind of like a chameleon.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous area rug.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is gorgeous. The colors are wonderfully vivid and the rug is very plush. In addition, the rug was wrapped very securely and in very heavy plastic so it was in perfect shape when I received it.....as opposed to a different rug that was packed so inadequately that it arrived damaged. This rug, from my perspective, is perfect. The only problem that you might want to keep in mind is that it is so plush that it is very difficult to vacuum. But I would definitely order more rugs from this manufacturer without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: In love with this area rug!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 8x10 Ivory and Grey area rug. The ivory is much lighter than in the first picture as the lamp lights aren't giving off the best light. This rug is thick and just beautiful. Very well made and so incredibly soft and cool to the touch. Easy to vacuum. I am thrilled with this purchase. Excellent value for your money! A++++
customer_reviews.author: hamster for life

customer_reviews.title: Beware return fees, great rug just buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I like the rug what I didn’t like is I tried to cancel this after realizing if I didn’t like it I’d have to pay about $70 to return it. Walmart sells the same size and brand and same price and free shipping plus free returns. So I tried to cancel very soon after ordering and the company wouldn’t honor it despite the rug not having shipped. I ended up liking it and keeping it—but was upset I couldn’t cancel the order even right after I made it. Walmart is way better in case you want the option to return it without a $70 charge. (I got the 11x15).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super plush, soft
customer_reviews.text: Super plush, soft, and looks beautiful. For the price, I was blown away with the quality. VERY happy with the product. WARNING! - If you have cats, please be advised that some cats apparently feel the need to pee on shag rugs, even if they've never peed on any other rug or carpet before. Something about the high pile my two indoor cats did not like. They didn't want to step on it at all, unless they were headed to the center of it to empty their bladders. It offended them somehow. It was a shame because it was the prettiest carpet I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rug!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug in the navy/white 6'x9' and was not disappointed. It's a nice thick shag, the colors are spot on with the picture and I did not even need to flatten the corners under stuff. I would definitely buy again. It of course had a hint of new rug smell but it wasn't strong and a quick vacuum and spritz of febreeze took care of it. I assume airing it outside for an hour would do much the same (the rug was too big for me to do that).
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Shag Rug!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Safavieh rug and I was not disappointed! Great shag rug for our fire room. Lovely pattern blends with my grays and browns and blues, and shows almost zero dirt which is key in a house of 2 boys and a dog. It is a bit hard to clean. I turn it over and vacuum the back, then roll up and vacuum whatever fell out which is a bit more than you expect for how clean it looks. Only once a month is enough though. Very happy that I grabbed it when the price dropped. Seems and feels much more expensive than what I paid! Very cozy for the long winter!
customer_reviews.author: KatLo237

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the rug being delivered folded up. As others stated, the creases are hard if not impossible to get out. I gave up and decided to live with the big one. Seems it would have been just as easy to roll the carpet for storage and shipment. That said, I love the look and feel of the rug. Looks great in my front room.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tuel

customer_reviews.title: Soft, attractive,  great value
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short and sweet, I've had this 8 by 10 rug 4 about three months and it's one of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon in several years using it. Incredibly soft, great looking. If I absolutely had to find a negative thing to say about this rug it's that it smelled like chemicals for the first week. I simply hit it with Febreze everyday that first week and the smell dissipated. But I'm not about to take off a star for something so unimportant.
customer_reviews.author: Nemous

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for the couch to arrive but omg love this rug
customer_reviews.text: Searched so many sites, looked at so many rugs including this one on many sites and all the reviews were stellar for this item on every page. Waiting for the couch to arrive but omg love this rug, got the 5.1' x 7.6'. So soft, also got the 2'3" x 6' runner and it's great as well. The price should be more for the quality. Love and would suggest for you to purchase if you are on the fence about it
customer_reviews.author: AriesYoung04

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and itchy
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness, enjoying lying on it watching movie. But it smells very plastic, and I got itching all over....maybe I should try a few days more and to see if it will go away. My plan was get another size rag if this is good one, according to many good review, but now I can’t even decide to returning or not... PS I decided to keep it as there is no bug found whatsoever, even the plastic smell still there...but not another order.
customer_reviews.author: OK 1688

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: We love this rug! I’m so happy we were able to find such a good buy on Amazon. I was hesitant at first to make such a big purchase without seeing it in person or feeling it, but I don’t regret this purchase one bit! It is so soft and matches our decor perfectly. I know some people complained about there being an odor when they first opened it, but it’s not bad or overpowering. It just has that new smell. We’ve had it for a couple of weeks and the smell is practically gone without having sprayed anything. I’m sure if we sprayed something like Febreze it would have gone away sooner. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine B

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on the color.
customer_reviews.text: I like the rug. It's plush, lays flat, doesn't move. 3 stars, would have been 5 but I don't like the color. 0 stars. I wanted a bluish grey. The rug is more brownish grey. I wouldn't even call it grey. It's much more taupe/brown. I didn't know how I would possibly return it. It comes rolled up in heavy plastic. I will end up using it in a closet. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lprp8

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! Cheap and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was having a problem with my computer chair rubbing all over my wood floors, was looking around for a cheap but nice rug online EVERYWHERE, but didn't find anything that combined great price with looks nice. Never thought I was going to buy a rug on Amazon, but IT TURNED OUT GREAT!!!! I love how soft it is and it was a REALLY good price too!! If I need more rugs for the house I am totally going to buy from here again. The rug is nice thick and long fibers and dont fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Kat B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, look NO further, this is EVERYTHING💟
customer_reviews.text: This rug is AMAZING. I am at a loss for words! It is so so plush, and soft, and stylish to boot. Don't get a cheaper rug (like I did) only to go thru the hassle of packing it up and shipping it right back. I started with the 6' runner, in gray/ivory and now I'm sold on the S. Hudson - and need the larger rug to match. Getting an 8' x 10' for the living room remodel after I'm done typing this ... Did I say GORGEOUS?!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This rug is soft to touch, has so much padding and looks very elegant! I ended up ordering the gray/white 8x10. It ended up having a lot of browns and tan in it but I really like it. The color will be perfect for messy kids and dogs. I originally had the Dallas rug by the same name brand of rugs. It was a lot cheaper-$100 less than this one. After comparing both rugs & reviews on here, the Dallas rug couldn’t compare to this one. The quality and material of this rug is so much nicer and cozier to touch. I’m really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids room
customer_reviews.text: I got the 9x12 size and was very impressed with the steps taken during shipping. It arrived earlier than expected and completely undamaged. It is very heavy and required two people up the stairs at this size. Once rolled out it laid flat and looked great. The shag is very deep and muy kids love it. My only complaint is that it did have a new carpet chemical smell which was gone overnight with a fan and open window. Highly recommend and 100% will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Hilary H.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the quality and softness! Expected it to not be this nice for the price paid. Pattern isn’t separated as well as in the pics and the gray is a light gray-brown. So if you’re wanting true gray or a dark gray, this is not the rug for you. But if you’re wanting a soft rug that looks great - then this is the rug for you. Overall happy with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KMJ760

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug!
customer_reviews.text: Great Rug! This rug looks and feels great. The price was amazing for our 10 x 14 rug. The one thing you need to think about is the fact that you will need a vacuum that can raise its height and can turn off the beater bar. We had to purchase a new vacuum. I highly recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roger Clore

customer_reviews.title: Thick Yummy Rug
customer_reviews.text: Rug is beautiful, thick and just all around yummy, Have had several big parties over the various holidays and rugs have held up great. They're well made and I expect them to last a long time ( I have had them a couple years now. Grand kid's want to just lay around on it and play. The color is really nice, I wondered about it because furniture is a tan color, but it looks beautiful together. I bought 11x15 and three 2' 3" x 3' 9", vacuum regularly and they are so beautiful. I have loved them so much am ordering another for guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this rug!!! After searching for a rug for over 5 months and returning one back, this rug definitely met all of our expectations! We have a reddish brown sectional and wanted to get away from having another brown rug, our walls are a light grey so it brought everything together nicely. This rug is mostly grey, the cream lines have very subtle beige, I know that color and style is a personal preference, but the quality of this rug is just Amazing, it's thick and soft. We purchased the Grey/Ivory in a 9x9 and won't be needing any padding underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: OBen

customer_reviews.title: This rug is beautiful! We ordered the 5'x7' and it's the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This rug is beautiful! We ordered the 5'x7' and it's the perfect area rug size for our living room. The carpet is soft and squishy and is very comfortable to sit on and just relax with a few pillows around you. Kids and pets love it!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer número one

customer_reviews.title: The colors are great with a nice neutral grey and an off-white almost ...
customer_reviews.text: We were a bit weary purchasing an area rug from Amazon without first feeling/seeing the product in person but we were pleasantly surprised with the quality of the Grey and White patterned Hudson Shag. The colors are great with a nice neutral grey and an off-white almost cream colored pattern. No pills or shedding, this is great on the feet and has lasted the whole year without a single pulled thread or issue. Would totally recommend, you will NOT be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the pattern but wanted to try out a small one before committing to a larger rug. Initially I loved the look. It wouldn't work at my back door because it was a bit to thick, so I put it in my kitchen. It was soft and felt great to stand on while washing dishes. Over the next few months, it lost some of its plushness, and the pattern became muddled. I decided against the larger rug since these didn't hold up too well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Plush, Bunny Approved!!🐰💕
customer_reviews.text: This was the EXACT rug I was looking for to complete my living room! 4’6’ is the size I purchased. It is so nice and comfortable and the blue color is beautiful! It arrived well packaged and it very easy to vacuum. The rug corners eventually laid down after being out for awhile. My bunny rabbit LOVES this rug! We are careful not to let him dig on it though! Lol Great buy! Beautiful, Plush, Bunny Approved!
customer_reviews.author: @CeymiChic💕

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super soft & fluffy, great price for what you get! It looks like really good quality. My ONLY complaint is I thought it would be longer in size, but really I still feel like I made an excellent purchase. I'm hoping its machine washable... oh also for hard wood or tile floors, just make sure you get something for under it so it doesn't slide, it's super slippery without one.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this rug. I was worried buying a rug online that it would disappoint me. That is not the case with this rug. The density and the color are both nice. The odor was minimal and dissipated. The edges laid down after a few hours of being rolled out. I used a think felt pad. I'd be afraid to put it on a wood floor without one.
customer_reviews.author: NCHTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a smaller rug for my upcoming baby’s nursery, I quickly turned around and ordered a larger rug for my toddlers room! This rug seriously cannot be beat for the price! It’s fluffy, feels padded and comfortable, and looks way more expensive than it is. There is a slight smell to the rug but I just opened it - and from other reviews I’ve read I anticipate it will go away. So happy with BOTH my rugs!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey K

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent rug. It is VERY plush and soft - very comfortable to walk on in bare feet. We haven't spilled that much on it yet, but so far it is easy to clean and doesn't show light stains. It has held up well to being in a heavily trafficked area of our home, even after a couple of months. It can be a bit difficult to vacuum if your vacuum cleaner has a spinning brush, but overall, I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CDubya

customer_reviews.title: Super Plush but you will need a high pile vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: So this rug was not at all what I was looking for, or so I thought. After three different failed attempts to purchase a new rug for my living room, I just "settled" for this one, and I could not be happier. This rug is super plush and soft to walk across. My kids love it, and it looks great. It is also well made. You do need a High pile vacuum cleaner, my shark did not work at all on this becasue of the thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very plush, soft and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Granted we just got this today, I am very pleased with this purchase. The rug is thick, soft, comfortable, looks & feels well made, and definitely a good price for what you get. After doing hours of research online for the perfect rug, I am glad to say this is exactly what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Wachowski

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: This rug is AMAZING! After buying a similar rug from another company, only to find it had zero cushioning, I was hesitant to buy another rug sight unseen...I chose to put my faith in the reviews on here, and am so glad I did! The pile is high, the rug is so soft, and it is literally like walking on a pillow. It vacuums easily, and I haven’t had any shedding. I will say the overall color is more of a light cocoa, than the grey I was hoping for, but I just added some new accent pieces to my room because this rug is just THAT FABULOUS! I could not recommend this rug more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Slippery!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with new bedding. I like color. Price was ok. However, there is no non slip backing, and it definitely slides. Also, not as dense a shag as it looks like in the pictures. That was a bit disappointing. I will run some hot glue across the back to give it some grip
customer_reviews.author: frugal designer

customer_reviews.title: My girl LOVES this new rug! 🐶
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new area rug and we happened to find this one on amazon....WE LOVE IT! Our girl (dog) loves to lay on the thick area rug! Hopefully it will hold up with the occasional pup accidents. **Must note, when vacuuming...you can only vacuum in one direction (otherwise it gets stuck in the vacuum). Also, roomba cannot get on top of this area rug. Roomba sometimes gets an error saying it is near a cliff when it tries to get on top of the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this rug as a final touch for our nursery. While the color is slightly more of a “cream” than I had anticipated, I cannot express how happy we are with it! It is so soft and plush. Well worth the cost. This is our second Safavieh rug we have purchased, and will most likely be what we’ll continue to purchase for other rooms in the future. Showing photos with the furniture to reference the white vs cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy rug
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfy under my feet and the threads stay in there well despite my cat messing with it at times. My only downfall about the rug is the pattern isn’t as precise after it’s been walked on and the white lines look a bit blurry, but a good vacuum job fixes that. Also, I originally thought it would be better not bein under the couches at all, but if I were to rebuy, I’d get it bigger so that it was.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal but flipped edges
customer_reviews.text: I just got the carpet and it looks great! It is good quality, doesn’t smell bad, and is very soft. The only issue is the edges are curling up from shipping. Hopefully they will flatten out with continued use but this is a concern to me. The price on this is great though for a new rug.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is better than I anticipated! We wanted a rug to soften the area my children are currently using as their playroom. The cream/gray color is EXACTLY the shade I was hoping for. The rug is the perfect thicknesses- I don’t anticipate any issue vacuuming this rug. It is soft and arrived well packaged. I used a few pillows to help uncurl the end of the rug.. it was laying flat in less than 6 hours. Super pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and easy on the feet. We bought this for the side of our bed and it's so nice when getting up in the morning not hitting hardwood right away. Colors are as pictured and it is a bit thick matting so a little more effort to clean. Very nice rug
customer_reviews.author: Colleen and Justin

customer_reviews.title: If you’re considering this rug, don’t hesitate! Go ahead and order, it’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carpet! The color is beautiful it’s like a cream versus a white. It’s so soft I do have a pad underneath which gives it extra squishiness! I highly recommend this rug! I was a little hesitant to order online site unseen. However, I was very pleased when my rug arrived. It was wrapped very well so no carpet was exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very fluffy once unrolled and fluffed. I suggest a vacuum to help. Love the design and colors. Just wish the gray color was a little more subtle. I unrolled and layed flat & the edges were still trying to roll up so I folded them under over night. Now it lays flat. And they had it so protected and wrapped up for transport!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Super plush and soft, yet slippery
customer_reviews.text: Super plush and perfect for our hallway to dampen the noise! It slides extremely easily on our hardwood though and we can't leave it down without something underneath it, even temporarily. Just walking on it makes it move inches from where we put it. We had to roll it up and run the target to get a grippy pad!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rug & Awesome Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I trusted the reviews on this rug because I love it! I'm not sure you can do any better for the price if you are looking for a soft, plush rug for a room in your house. We didn't experience any shedding and it's already lasted 6 months with no signs of wear. We bought it to cover hardwood floors in our living room so our baby had a softer place to play (and we had a softer place to sit on the ground with her). It's been perfect. If you're considering it, don't hesitate, it's such a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rug for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comparable rugs can run you $500 and up and this rug was $220 shipped and I love it. it is thick and soft and the "chemical smell" people are complaining about is just the normal new carpet smell. Be sure to check which level of rug you buy as the company offers many and they differ in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!! SOFT & VERY THICK
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptic ordering a rug online but I couldn’t find anything this big for this price so I took a chance and I absolutely love it!!! It’s so soft and thick, definitely looks and feels like a very high end rug with out a crazy price. I love it and will definitely buy more! Everyone that comes over compliments it and asks where I got it. My 2 yr old never laid on our old shag rug, it was cheaply priced and cheaply made, but the day I got it he fell asleep on it. Now he prefers laying in the living room floor to watch tv rather than the couch! Needless to say we love love love it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite - fluffy, soft and great colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug maker! We have about 4 or 5 throw rugs by this maker all different colors and textures. This rug by far is my favorite! It's crazy fluffy, super soft and exactly the color as shown on line. We have this one in our master bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C M

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous 9' x 9' Moroccan Design Square Plush Rug
customer_reviews.text: Picture says it all - really nice square rug. Colors go well with gray or brown furniture - it actually matched my my duvet cover that has the same Moroccan print. Another thing - my dog Snickers loves rolling around on it since it is a very soft almost shag-like rug (BTW it feels amazing on your feet too). Shipping said two weeks and it was on my door step in about 3 days - excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and understated luxury
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a limited timed prime deal and was worth every penny. The runner is made of an excellent soft fabric and the 'shagginess' is as advertised. The colors are subtle and dont look cheap as some of the other rugs I've purchased on here. If there was one complaint, it would be that the underside is cheap material in that it doesn't want to stay set. The rug slides around more so than your average rug of this thickness. Not a new phenomenon but just a FYI - you will need a mattress pad or tape underneath to keep this in place.
customer_reviews.author: DigiSym

customer_reviews.title: So plush!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sunroom on the back of my house with a fabulous view. There is a round glass table that sits on the round rug and it is very inviting for morning coffee and my feet aren't cold with the thick rug. It was more than I wanted to spend but after having it, I'd still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: EWWWW COLOR BUT SOFT
customer_reviews.text: DON'T GET THE IVORY/GREY.... Amazon was wonderful and gave a full refund. It's actually thick and soft. The color is our issue. We took this picture after we vacuumed it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Family

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Was searching and contemplating on this rug for some time. I finally decided to buy and am so pleased with my decision! I have 2 small kids and so far it has held up to a few accidents that I was able to get clean up in no time with no stains left behind. It vacuums well even with a standard vacuum. I have had for about 2 months now and I do not regret making the purchase. Although I did have a slight odor after unwrapping it that I assume is from the carpet material or backing but was gone after about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Nee

customer_reviews.title: I love this rug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug exceeded my expectations. It looks amazing in my bedroom room and is so soft to walk on. I recommend buying some non-slip pads if you have a wood or slick floor surface. I loved this so much I bought two smaller ones to add to the sides of my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Casie R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rug! We have had it for a few months now, and even with three young children it is holding up great. It’s so soft and comfortable! The quality seems great, highly recommend. Still looking like new!
customer_reviews.author: Em5OH2

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is sooooo nice.. I searched for shag rug almost for 1 month and finally decided to buy online. After reading reviews and pictures i decided to give it a try.I am so glad I bought it online(way cheaper that stores) and quality wise better too. only thing is I ordered and next day price was dropped by 35% 😣 . I love the look and feel or the rug. Its very thick and no rug mat is needed
customer_reviews.author: aps

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is PERFECTION!! We got it to replace a high quality --name brand---rug that was wool and stains were impossible to get out! This matches our grey decor perfectly and we had a spill the first day and it wiped up with just blotting with a little water-----incredible! Super SOFT----what a deal!!! Shipping was fast. Can't say enough about this rug...it is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Aims2

customer_reviews.title: Soft Enough
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this rug. Although it's not the softest I've felt, it's soft enough and looks great! In case you're wondering, the softest I've felt is from Living Spaces, but it also costs almost twice as much as this one. Oh, and there is a slight smell when you first unroll it. But it aired out in one day. Overall, I recommend this rug and wouldn't hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: The Dogfather

customer_reviews.title: Wow-great rug
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful and stylish rug. With a couple of puppies in the house, we’ve had a couple of accidents on it and it cleans up easily. I love the way it looks in my living. It’s so plush and soft. It’s a win win in my book. I’m looking to buy another one for my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great color and good quality for the price. Be cautious if ordering two different sizes in the same color as I did. One came as a light grey and ivory and the other was a dark grey with the ivory. Both were listed as the same colors but arrived very different. I had to order another in the hopes that it will come to match the first one.
customer_reviews.author: mainemom38

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick, beautiful quality
customer_reviews.text: WOW WOW WOW! This rug has it all! Super soft, multi-tone so it matched my couch perfectly! It's thick, soft, and easy to vacuum. I did put a non-slip gripper under it. I had to put some books down on it to bend the corners. An hour later, perfection! It does not shed. This is such a nice change from the rug I bought a week prior, that came to me stinking, with mildew. (different company). Highly recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: adreon Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Shag Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little frugal, so spending over $100 on a 6 x 9 area rug was a bit of a tough decision. However, after having it now for a month, I am happy I did. Received it 3 days before Christmas and on Christmas we hosted a party and got many compliments about how soft it is and how nice it looks. It is really shaggy so vacuuming it is kind of tough and that is my only complaint. Walking barefoot on this is like a fluffy, soft cloud.
customer_reviews.author: ThistleDew

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bedroom rug! The geometric pattern is a bit larger than I would have liked (diamonds are over 12" by 12") but it's ok. Good value for the money & very soft. I plan to shake it outside occasionally to keep it looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Gail - Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: Sooo happy with this rug. I was hesitant to order online but the reviews convinced me and they weren’t wrong. Great quality, very plush and soft, little to no chemical smell and looks exactly as it appears in the pictures. Looks and feels way more expensive than it was. I would definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is exactly what we wanted! We recently finished our basement with luxury vinyl flooring and wanted a nice area rug for our sectional. This rug is great quality - it is soft, has a nice combo of colors and I can tell it will last a long time. I looked at other retailers at the same rug and the price on amazon was a fraction. Our 2 year old loves playing on it and I love that it keeps her from getting bumps and bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Missjanej

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice color.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful well made rug. It came packaged well. 2 things: You have to be patient letting the edges lay down. I put heavy objects around it for couple of days which helped. Also you must have rug mat along with rug gripper if you don't have furniture sitting on it somewhere. Otherwise it will slide around because it's not real heavy. I would absolutely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bug 60

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this carpet!!! It is SOOOOO soft, and up grades the look of our living room area. And to keep it fluffy, I bought a wooden rug rake from "Herman Miller". It is recommended to vacuum W/O a rotating brush.
customer_reviews.author: Leni

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Plush!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as runners next to my bed. I'm very happy with the heavy hand and backing, great quality for this price! Plush exactly like the pictures.. Delivered one day early too!( No hiding what it is though when delivered!!/arrived as shown in picture)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this rug!!! Can't say enough great things about it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug. This is my second rug that I have bought from this seller and once again they have not let me down. I believe I will always buy my rugs from them. The quality, the texture and they are so soft. I am looking for additional colors. When I need a new rug, this is where I am going.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: So Plush!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this carpet. It was so worth the $$. Nice and plush. I was worried about the plushness and vacuuming it. Not a problem at all. Vacuums up nicely. I was happy, that I purchased another one for my dining area and get compliments. I think the $ value is very good too. You'll be very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks great and is high quality. However, I ordered the 5 foot square rug and it is actually 5 1/2 ft by 5 1/2 ft (66 inches by 66 inches). I'm going to make it work b/c I like it, but the rug doesn't fit in the spot as well as it would have if it was actually 5 ft by 5 ft as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Terri HumphreyBattson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rug for a Queen Bed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rug based upon the reviews, and boy, did it live up to the hype. The 8x8 size was perfect for my queen-sized bed, and it’s so soft. Furthermore, it feels like high-quality at a bargain price. The only reason that I gave it 4 stars for “Easy to Clean” is because I’m sure my dog’s fur will get stuck in it due to the high pile, but I love it regardless. I highly recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kaznowski

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this online as I could not feel the material in person. I am glad I bought it because it it thick and super soft. I love the ivory color however, the gray lines are a little darker than I thought they would be. Overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Alison Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great rug, size not 100% accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love the actual rug, but for the second time now the rug is not cut accurately. My first rug was missing 5 feet (was a 9x12) and this 8’ round rug is missing 4” all around. Make sure to measure to make sure yours is what you paid for. I will be contacting amazon and Safavieh.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg idk where to start! I’m super happy with the way this rug looks in my sons nursery! The material is AMAZING and to top it off it’s so comfortable and super cushiony (if that’s even a word) I would definitely buy from this seller again. Shipping was fast and it came super wrapped up. I have zero complaints. I’ve gotten so many compliments and ppl can’t believe I bought it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia04

customer_reviews.title: Modern Rug!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rug! I was afraid about getting the ivory color, but am so glad we went for it! It gives our living room a modern feel. My husband and I decided to splurge on an ivory rug because we know it’s a luxury we may not have once we have kids. We’ve only had the rug for a couple of months and have been able to keep it clean. No shoes on the rug allowed! This rug is definitely worth the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Luchembe

customer_reviews.title: Order this!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is amazing! It is so plush!!! I purchased the 11x14 and it’s very soft. It only took about 2-3 days for any wrinkles to fall out of the rug. I thought for sure this would be cheap quality but it is absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Love everything but...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is wonderful, except sometimes it has a weird smell. I've noticed it especially when the sun is directly on it. If only I could give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Rolen K. West

product_meta.title: Safavieh Hudson Shag Collection SGH282A Ivory and Grey Moroccan Geometric Quatrefoil Area Rug (4' x 6')
product_meta.description:
Size:4' x 6'| Color:Ivory/GreyThe Hudson Shag Collection draws inspiration from traditional Moroccan designs and translates it into modern day sensibilities. This rug features a charming quatrefoil motif that offers geometric visual intrigue. With an ivory background and a grey pattern, this rug’s versatile neutral palette will blend seamlessly with existing décor.

Expertly power-loomed and constructed of enhanced polypropylene, this rug is virtually non-shedding for convenient upkeep. A tangible delight, this rug features a pile height of 2-inches that creates an incredibly plush feeling underfoot. Add just the right amount of flair to your living space to create a decadently cozy atmosphere for all to enjoy.



 *  Primary Material: Polypropylene
 * Style: Shag
 * Latex and Jute backing
 * Country of Origin: Turkey
 * Primary Color: Ivory
 * Rug Dimensions: 4' x 6'
feature_bullets: Safavieh's Hudson Shag Quatrefoil Rug with 800+ customer reviews
Contemporary visually intriguing Moroccan-inspired geometric pattern for a designer look in any room
Luxurious and plush, the Hudson shag rug promotes an incredibly soft feeling underfoot
Extra thick 2-inch pile height provides exceptional sink-in comfort
Power-loomed with soft, thick, polypropylene fibers to ensure a durable, long-lasting, and virtually non-shedding rug
Works beautifully with contemporary, transitional, casual, and modern styles of décor
Safavieh has been a trusted brand in home furnishings for over 100 years, providing quality craftsmanship and unmatched style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,820 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
